item.title: Connecting your pfSense to Microsoft Sentinel
item.description: Lab Stuff Just a collection of templates, scripts, configuration files and testing observations to make my life easier. This is part of my own GitHub repository (and one of the fews I make public), so use the content and scripts here at your own risk :) Table of Contents Integrating Sentinel and Home Infrastructure Syslog server Provisioning the VM Configuring the Syslog Server Creating a Firewall rule to allow incoming traffic to Logstash Configuring pfSense Configuring Log Analytics Workspace Final Step: Sentinel!
